DEMO_115_MSG_010:
̃The time has finally arrived, has it?
ā
DEMO_115_MSG_020: ̃I truly apologize... for leaving such a heavy burden upon your shoulders.
DEMO_115_MSG_030: ́There is no need to apologize. We've taken this responsibility of our own accord.
DEMO_115_MSG_040:
̂Really, it's okay... We're going to succeed, that's for sure... 
You just need to believe in the both us.
DEMO_115_MSG_050:
̃Very well, and I shall do my duty and protect the child. 
I'll not allow one enemy to harm a single hair upon his head.
DEMO_115_MSG_060:
̂Perfect... we both believe in you, as you should in us. 
Now then, shall we take to the skies?
DEMO_115_MSG_070: ̃It's all up to you two now... The future of this entire world depends on your success... I believe in you both...
